title: My Pocket Coach
filterKeywords: my pocket coach image excellence gail cameron communication leadership personal mastery team effectiveness organizational performance image conflict management life coaching communication skills personal impact power
description: My Pocket Coach is an online coaching platform to develop the personal impact power and all aspects of personal mastery, team effectiveness and organizational performance. We empower our clients to communicate with impact, manage impressions, influence, lead, and direct with distinction. These critical abilities produce powerful brand ambassadors who captivate the imagination and turn strategy into reality. My pocket coach offers coaching tips and guidance that is scientifically-based, holistic and integrated, mobilising field experts to provide sustainable outcomes. Our team of multi-disciplinary specialists apply a unique methodology combining digital guidance, assessments, and online coaching to empower individuals.
